title: Running Back
description: Eventually things that are hidden have a way of coming to the light.Garrett is tired of following the rules. Where did that ever get him? With all his friends and teammates partying, Garrett is compelled to do the same. He's doing great on the football team and even though he isn't supposed to have a girlfriend, he does anyway. Garrett isn't prepared to fall in love, especially when things start to catch up with him. Is he able to deal with the consequences? Or will he take the easy way out?
author: Emily Camp
